explanations.machine learning: The paper proposes a hybrid machine learning-based method (HXGBTM) for cyber threat mitigation, indicating the use of machine learning techniques.
explanations.classification: The HXGBTM method utilizes the classification capabilities of the XGBoost ensemble of decision trees to identify anomalies in electrical consumption data.
explanations.regression: The HXGBTM method also leverages the regression capabilities of the XGBoost ensemble of decision trees for anomaly mitigation.
explanations.decision tree: The proposed method is built upon the XGBoost ensemble of decision trees, which is a key component of the approach.
